Related

Stats

Historical

Biography

Honors

MVFC Honor Roll: 2021, 2022

MSU Athletic Director's Honor Roll: Fall 2021, Spring 2022, Fall 2022, Spring 2023, Spring 2024

2023

Saw action in 2 games as a third-year squad member in 2023 ... Made season debut in home win over Utah Tech (9/23/23) ... Also saw action in road victory at Western Illinois (10/14/23) â€¦ Was on travel squad for 3-of-6 road games ... Named to MSU Athletic Director's Honor Roll for Spring 2024 semester.

2022

Played in just one game as a redshirt freshman, seeing action in season opener at Central Arkansas (9/1/22) ... Was also in uniform for home opener vs. UT Martin (9/8/22) but did not play ... Earned a spot on the MVFC Honor Roll ... Named to Athletic Director's Honor Roll for Fall 2022 semester and Spring 2023 semesters.

2021

Played in 4 games as a true freshman offensive lineman to earn redshirt ... Made his debut at Illinois State (10/2/21) ... Played in home wins over Indiana State (10/16/21) and North Dakota (10/30/21) and road win at Dixie State (11/20/21) ... Was on travel squad for all 6 road games ... Named to MVFC Honor Roll ... Earned spot on MSU Athletic Director's Honor Roll for Fall 2021 and Spring 2022 semesters.

High School

Was a Missouri Class 6 all-state second teamer in 2020 and a first-team all-district tackle for coach Tony Severino at Kansas City Rockhurst High ... Hawklets team captain was rated as a three-star recruit by 247Sports.com which also tabbed him the No. 29 player in Missouri ... Had offers from North Dakota State, Ball State, Indiana State, Western Kentucky, Miami (Ohio) ... Was part of a 12-3 state runner-up team at Rockhurst his sophomore year.

Personal

Brett Joseph Harris was born 9/30/02 ... Son of Bart and Jennifer Harris of Kansas City, Mo. ... Has a brother, Bart ... Father played football and ran track at Missouri ... Brother played QB at Tennessee ... Majoring in General Business.
